'''''-yon''''' is a [[Quenya]] suffix that has two meanings.
==-yon<sup>1</sup>==
Used as a patronimic suffix.<ref>{{PE|Eldarin}}, p.190</ref>
===Examples===
*''Yondo'' - "son, boy"
==-yon<sup>2</sup>==
Also written as ''-yonde'', (from root [[YŎNO]]), for denoting a region, any (fairly extensive) region ''between obstacles'' such as rivers or mountains.<ref>{{PE|Eldarin}}, p.43</ref>
==See also==
*''[[-ion]]'', ''[[-ion]]de''<!--Should this be merged?-->
